languages.text: "Без "или". Фроше — член моей свиты уже на протяжении полусотни терранских лет и человек, наиболее близко подобравшийся к званию моего конфидента". {n}Нечто, похожее на теплую улыбку, касается губ инквизитора.{/n} "Нам довелось стать участниками многих отчетов, на которые была наложена печать молчания".

"Why can't both be true? Froscher has been a member of my retinue for fifty Terran years and the person in my entourage who comes closest to being my confidant." {n}Something akin to a warm smile touches the Inquisitor's lips.{/n} "We have had cause to be involved in many incidents whose reports have since been marked with a seal of silence."
languages.original_text: "Без "или". Фроше — член моей свиты уже на протяжении полусотни терранских лет и человек, наиболее близко подобравшийся к званию моего конфидента". {n}Нечто, похожее на теплую улыбку, касается губ инквизитора.{/n} "Нам довелось стать участниками многих отчетов, на которые была наложена печать молчания".

traits.locale_text: "Why can't both be true? Froscher has been a member of my retinue for fifty Terran years and the person in my entourage who comes closest to being my confidant." {n}Something akin to a warm smile touches the Inquisitor's lips.{/n} "We have had cause to be involved in many incidents whose reports have since been marked with a seal of silence."

"Why can't both be true? Froscher has been a member of my retinue for fifty Terran years and the person in my entourage who comes closest to being my confidant." {n}Something akin to a warm smile touches the Inquisitor's lips.{/n} "We have had cause to be involved in many incidents whose reports have since been marked with a seal of silence."

"Why can't both be true? Froscher has been a member of my retinue for fifty Terran years and the person in my entourage who comes closest to being my confidant." {n}Something akin to a warm smile touches the Inquisitor's lips.{/n} "We have had cause to be involved in many incidents whose reports have since been marked with a seal of silence."

"Why can't both be true? Froscher has been a member of my retinue for fifty Terran years and the person in my entourage who comes closest to being my confidant." {n}Something akin to a warm smile touches the Inquisitor's lips.{/n} "We have had cause to be involved in many incidents whose reports have since been marked with a seal of silence."

languages.text: “为什么不能两者都是呢？在过去的五十个泰拉年里，弗罗舍一直都在担任我的随从，也是我所有随从之中最接近知己的人。”{n}大审判官的嘴角露出了一丝温暖的笑意。{/n}“我们一起处理过很多事件，而这些事件的报告都已经盖棺定论，再也不会提起了。”
languages.original_text: "Why can't both be true? Froscher has been a member of my retinue for fifty Terran years and the person in my entourage who comes closest to being my confidant." {n}Something akin to a warm smile touches the Inquisitor's lips.{/n} "We have had cause to be involved in many incidents whose reports have since been marked with a seal of silence."

traits.locale_text: “为什么不能两者都是呢？在过去的五十个泰拉年里，弗罗舍一直都在担任我的随从，也是我所有随从之中最接近知己的人。”{n}审判长的嘴角露出了一丝温暖的笑意。{/n}“我们一起处理过很多事件，而这些事件的报告都已经盖棺定论，再也不会提起了。”

languages.text: «¿Acaso no pueden ser las dos cosas? Froscher lleva en mi séquito cincuenta años terranos y de todos mis ayudantes es el que más cerca está de ser mi confidente». {n}Algo que no dista demasiado de ser una sonrisa cálida aparece en la boca del Inquisidor.{/n} «Nos hemos visto envueltos en numerosos incidentes cuyos informes están marcados con un sello de silencio».
languages.original_text: "Why can't both be true? Froscher has been a member of my retinue for fifty Terran years and the person in my entourage who comes closest to being my confidant." {n}Something akin to a warm smile touches the Inquisitor's lips.{/n} "We have had cause to be involved in many incidents whose reports have since been marked with a seal of silence."

traits.locale_text: «¿Acaso no pueden ser las dos cosas? Froscher lleva en mi séquito cincuenta años terranos y de todos mis ayudantes es el que más cerca está de ser mi confidente». {n}Algo que no dista demasiado de ser una sonrisa cálida aparece en la boca del Inquisidor.{/n} «Nos hemos visto envueltos en numerosos incidentes cuyos informes están marcados con un sello de silencio».

languages.text: 「もちろん、どちらもだ。フロッシャーは50地球年間にわたって私の従者の一員であるとともに、側近の中で最も近しい親友でもある」{n}温かい笑顔に似た何かが異端審問官の唇に現れる。{/n}「数多くの事件に関与し、その報告書に黙秘印が押されてきたことには理由があるのだ」
languages.original_text: "Why can't both be true? Froscher has been a member of my retinue for fifty Terran years and the person in my entourage who comes closest to being my confidant." {n}Something akin to a warm smile touches the Inquisitor's lips.{/n} "We have had cause to be involved in many incidents whose reports have since been marked with a seal of silence."

traits.locale_text: 「もちろん、どちらもだ。フロッシャーは50地球年間にわたって私の従者の一員であるとともに、側近の中で最も近しい親友でもある」{n}温かい笑顔に似た何かが異端審問官の唇に現れる。{/n}「数多くの事件に関与し、その報告書に黙秘印が押されてきたことには理由があるのだ」

languages.text: « Et pourquoi pas les deux ? Froscher est à mon service depuis cinquante années de Terra, et de tout mon entourage, c'est lui qui se rapproche le plus d'un confident. » {n}Un sourire presque chaleureux apparaît sur le visage du seigneur inquisiteur.{/n} « Nous nous sommes retrouvés impliqués dans de nombreux incidents dont les rapports sont aujourd'hui marqués du sceau du silence. »
languages.original_text: "Why can't both be true? Froscher has been a member of my retinue for fifty Terran years and the person in my entourage who comes closest to being my confidant." {n}Something akin to a warm smile touches the Inquisitor's lips.{/n} "We have had cause to be involved in many incidents whose reports have since been marked with a seal of silence."

traits.locale_text: « Et pourquoi pas les deux ? Froscher est à mon service depuis cinquante années de Terra, et de tout mon entourage, c'est lui qui se rapproche le plus d'un confident. » {n}Un sourire presque chaleureux apparaît sur le visage du seigneur inquisiteur.{/n} « Nous nous sommes retrouvés impliqués dans de nombreux incidents dont les rapports sont aujourd'hui marqués du sceau du silence. »

languages.text: "Warum nicht beides? Froscher ist seit fünfzig Terra-Jahren ein Mitglied meines Gefolges und die Person, die ich am ehesten als Vertrauten bezeichnen würde." {n}Auf den Lippen des Inquisitors ist kurz fast so etwas wie ein warmes Lächeln zu erkennen.{/n} "Wir haben viele Vorfälle gemeinsam durchlebt, deren Berichte seitdem das Siegel des Schweigens ziert."
languages.original_text: "Why can't both be true? Froscher has been a member of my retinue for fifty Terran years and the person in my entourage who comes closest to being my confidant." {n}Something akin to a warm smile touches the Inquisitor's lips.{/n} "We have had cause to be involved in many incidents whose reports have since been marked with a seal of silence."

traits.locale_text: "Warum nicht beides? Froscher ist seit fünfzig Terra-Jahren ein Mitglied meines Gefolges und die Person, die ich am ehesten als Vertrauten bezeichnen würde." {n}Auf den Lippen des Inquisitors ist kurz fast so etwas wie ein warmes Lächeln zu erkennen.{/n} "Wir haben viele Vorfälle gemeinsam durchlebt, deren Berichte seitdem das Siegel des Schweigens ziert."

languages.text: "İkisi de olamaz mı? Froscher, elli Terra yılı boyu benim maiyetimin bir parçası olmuştur. Ayrıca kendisi, emrimdekilerin arasında sağkolum olmaya en yakın olandır." {n}Engizisyoncu'nun dudaklarında sıcak bir tebessüme benzer bir şey beliriyor.{/n} "Raporlarına sessizlik mührü vurulmuş çok badireler atlattık."
languages.original_text: "Why can't both be true? Froscher has been a member of my retinue for fifty Terran years and the person in my entourage who comes closest to being my confidant." {n}Something akin to a warm smile touches the Inquisitor's lips.{/n} "We have had cause to be involved in many incidents whose reports have since been marked with a seal of silence."
